BlackFortress::

Internal defences of BlackFortress turned on and open fire againts 
Foxfingers and Razorclaws. other Slidded door closed behin and 
infront of the muntants in that way that they could ran away and hide 
in any place. The doors could resist every sort of weapons.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Razor Claw transformed to Wolverine mode and in a blink of time he 
shot out of the room into the hallway. 
> 
> Foxfingers waited hoping that the Predacons would turn and chase 
the blur that had just sped by. If they hesitated he would strike 
from behind.
> 
> Silver Scout sniffed the air, she could sense the tension coming 
from all around her. Moving slowly she moved out of the corner that 
she'd been hiding in.
> 
> Blaze searched carefully for Silver Scout. If anyone asked she'd 
make up a story but the tigress hoped she wouldn't run into anyone 
who knew of her orders.
